album_name: Huling El Bimbo (Live at 2022 The Eraserheads Reunion Concert)
track_name: Magasin - Live at 2022 The Eraserheads Reunion Concert
lyrics_full:
[Intro: Crowd]
Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh!
[Verse: Crowd]
Nakita kita sa isang magasin
Dilaw ang 'yong suot at buhok mo'y green
Isang tindahan sa may Baclaran
Napatingin, natulala sa iyong kagandahan
[Verse: Ely Buendia]
Naaalala mo pa ba no'ng tayo pang dal'wa?
'Di ko inakalang sisikat ka
Tinawanan pa kita, tinawag mo 'kong walang hiya
Medyo pangit ka pa no'n, ngunit ngayon
[Chorus: Ely Buendia]
Hey!, iba na ang 'yong ngiti, iba na ang 'yong tingin
Nagbago na'ng lahat sa'yo, oh, oh
Sana'y hindi nakita, sana'y walang problema
'Pagkat kulang ang dala kong perang
[Post-Chorus: Ely Buendia]
Pambili, ooh
Pambili sa mukha mong maganda
[Verse: Ely Buendia]
Siguro ay may kotse ka na ngayon
Rumarampa sa entablado, damit mo'y gawa ni Sotto
Siguro ay malapit ka na ring sumali
Sa Supermodel of the Whole Wide Universe
[Chorus: Ely Buendia]
Kasi iba na ang 'yong ngiti, iba na ang 'yong tingin
Nagbago na'ng lahat sa'yo, oh, oh
Sana'y hindi nakita, sana'y walang problema
'Pagkat kulang ang dala kong pera
[Guitar Solo: Marcus Adoro & Ely Buendia]
[Verse: Ely Buendia]
Nakita kita sa isang magasin
At sa sobrang gulat, 'di ko napansin
[Verse: Crowd & Ely Buendia]
Bastos pala ang pamagat, dali-dali ang binuklat
At ako'y namulat sa hubad na katotohanan
[Chorus: Ely Buendia]
Hey, iba na ang 'yong ngiti, iba na ang 'yong tingin
Nagbago na'ng lahat sa'yo, oh, oh
Sana'y hindi nakita, sana'y walang problema
'Pagkat kulang ang dala kong pera
[Chorus: Ely Buendia]
Hey, kasi iba na ang 'yong ngiti, iba na ang 'yong tingin
Nagbago nang lahat sa'yo, oh, oh
Sana'y hindi nakita, sana'y walang problema
'Pagkat kulang ang dala kong perang
[Post-Chorus: Ely Buendia]
Pambili, ooh
Pambili sa mukha mong maganda
[Outro: Eraserheads & Crowd]
Nasa'n ka na kaya?
Sana ay masaya
Sana sa susunod na issue
Ay centerfold
[Outro]
Ka na, ah, ah (Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh)
Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh, oooh

lyrics_full:
'Sang linggong wala sa bahay
Pare ayoko ng mag-aral
Hinahanap na ako ni nanay
'Di malaman ang gagawin
Paghawak-hawak ng gitara
Ba't 'di mo matapos-tapos ang kanta?
Nakatira sa kakilala
Hoy, pahiram naman ng tuwalya mo
Hoy, hoy, hoy, bato na naman
Asan na bang barkada't kaibigan
Wala ba tayong gimik d'yan?
Asan na ba kayo, pautang naman

Ako, eto pa rin nababato
Bad trip talaga 'tong Meralco
Bakit brownout pa rin dito!?

Walang silbi sa bahay
Kundi bumabad sa telepono
O, kaya'y kasama ang buong barkada
Nakatambay sa may kanto

Ako'y naiinit na, bawat oras, binibilang
Sabik na masilayan ka

May gas, wala namang kotse
Naghihintay ng ulan
Basketball sa banyo
Sana ay may pasok na para at least

Cutting classes, dating raket
Rock and roll, buong taon!

Hey Jay, nabugbog ka na naman daw kahapon

Alam mo namang galit sila sa tulad mo
Alam mo namang 'di ka nila maiintindihan

Hey just look to the left and just look to the right
Makikita mo naman na hindi pantay-pantay na
He-he-he-hey Jay
Everything's gonna be okay (Everything's gonna be okay)

lyrics_full:
[Verse 1]
Minsan sa may Kalayaan tayo'y nagkatagpuan
May mga sariling gimik
At kaniya-kaniyang hangad sa buhay
Sa ilalim ng iisang bubong
Mga sikretong ibinubulong
Kahit na anong mangyari
Kahit na saan ka man patungo
[Pre-Chorus]
Ngunit ngayon
Kay bilis maglaho ng kahapon
Sana'y 'wag kalimutan
Ang ating mga pinagsamahan
[Chorus]
At kung sakaling gipitin
Ay laging iisipin na

lyrics_full:
[Chorus]
Lift your head, baby, don't be scared
Of the things that could go wrong along the way
You'll get by with a smile
You can't win at everything but you can try
[Verse 1]
Baby, you don't have to worry
'Cause there ain't no need to hurry
No one ever said that there's an easy way
When they're closing all their doors
And they don't want you anymore
It sounds funny but I'll say it anyway
[Chorus]
Girl, I'll stay through the bad times
Even if I have to fetch you everyday
We'll get by with a smile
You can never be too happy in this life
[Verse 2]
'Cause in a world where everybody
Hates a happy ending story
It's a wonder love can make the world go round
But don't let it bring you down
And turn your face into a frown
Get along with a little prayer and a song
[Bridge]
(Too, doo-doo-doo)
Let me hear you sing it
(Too, doo-doo-doo)
[Verse 2]
'Cause in a world where everybody

It's a wonder love can make the world go round
But don't let it bring you down
And turn your face into a frown
Get along with a little prayer and a song
[Chorus]
Lift your head, baby, don't be scared
Of the things that could go wrong along the way
You'll get by with a smile
So now it's time to kiss away those tears, goodbye
[Outro]
(Too, doo-doo-doo)
Let me hear you sing it
(Too, doo-doo-doo)
With a smile

Chu-rut, chut-chu-ru-rut
Chut-chu-ru-rut
Chut-chu-ru-rut

Hoy pare, dahan-dahan lang, muntik ka nang mahulog

Bigla na lang natutulala, umiiyak, tumatawa
Meron ding nagnanakaw at nawawalan ng pera

lyrics_full:
[Intro]
I wish I could go back to those fairy book tales
Forget the real world awhile
And seek the seas of the talking whales
A place of wishing wells and magic spells
A place of wishing wells and magic spells
Where everything starts out once upon a time
Long, long ago and ends happily ever after
[Verse 1]
I could go up the hill and run with Jill
The giant could smell I'm no Englishman
Cinderella danced with me at the ball
I told the queen of hearts about my plan
I travelled wonderland with Alice
I met with Snow White in the woods
I flew with Peter Pan in never, never land
Picked some berries with miss Red Riding Hood
[Chorus]
I wish I could go back to those fairy book tales
Forget the real world awhile
And seek the seas of the talking whales
A place of wishing wells and magic spells
A place of wishing wells and magic spells
Where everything starts out once upon a time
Long, long ago and ends happily ever after
[Verse 2]
I could be an outlaw in the west
Save the damsels in distress
We could sleep a hundred years
I could wake you up with a kiss
We'll swim the seven seas
We could make love more than twice
Fly like dragons in the skies
[Verse 3]
We could hang around the trees up
Buzz around like bees
We could make some honey
We don't need no money, baby
Just turn your back
You'll see jumpin' jelly beans sack
Just wait for me Jack
I'll be back, I'll be back
[Chorus]
I wish I could go back to those fairy book tales
Forget the real world awhile
And seek the seas of the talking whales
A place of wishing wells and magic spells
A place of wishing wells and magic spells
Where everything starts out once upon a time
Long, long ago and ends happily ever after
[Outro]
Place of wishing wells and magic spells
Place of wishing wells and magic spells
A place of wishing wells and magic spells
A place of wishing wells and magic spells

lyrics_full:
[Spoken]
Oy, I'm Punk Zappa
And my hobbies are listening to radio
Reading the song hits and eating b-bloody fish balls
A-ha, bibili ako ng tapes ng Nirvana
Pearl Jam, Sepultura, Alice in Chains, Soundgarden
Rage Against the Machine, Pantera
'Tsaka 'yung Red Hot Chili Peppers band
'Tsaka lahat ng klase ng grunge, lahat ng death metal, okay?
Tapos me-memorize ko 'yung lyrics kahit chorus lang, okay?
Tapos magpapakalbo, magpapa-mohawk, magpa-long hair kaya 'ko?
Tapos magpapa-tattoo ako, dapat 'yung nakakatakot
Ah, dragon, pare, tapos 'yung dragon, nakatusok sa stick
Tapos 'yung stick, nakatusok sa ulo ni Charles Manson, Jr
Cool 'yon, 'di ba?
Tapos dapat mayro'n akong boots
O kaya naman Converse para sa slam dancing
Tapos, oy, bibili akong Nirvana t-shirt
Hindi 'yung yellow, ha, 'yung red
Tapos magpapahikaw ako
Tapos, 'di puwede na akong makitribo sa mga kamukha ko
Oy, tapos puwede na kaming tumambay sa Club Dredd
Sa labas lang, ha?
Tapos 'pag Linggo, pupunta kaming lahat sa, sa Megamall
Tapos aabangan naming mga hip-hop na 'yan
Tapos pag-uumpugin ko 'yang mga kiningining breakdancer at mga "yo" na 'yan, eh
Tapos bubugbugin namin sila
Tapos kukunin namin 'yung mga TFs nila, okay ba 'yon?
Oy, Amen, gusto niyo? (Amen), t'yak 'yon (Amen)

lyrics_full:
You can take me to the prom, promise not to tell your mom
Mama never tells you why, but she kicks you in the eye
I don't think she understands, I just wanna hold your hand
I don't even own a car, so we couldn't get that far
Father Marcus said to me, just confess and you'll be free
Sit you down upon my my lap, tell me your sins just like that
He said "Babe, you know the rules, you're livin' in a Catholic school"
All the teachers say you're fine, but they don't have dirty minds
I am only in my teens, I live only for my dreams
I cannot be made to stay
Life's a journey anyway
Life's a journey anyway, hey
[Guitar Solo]
Teacher, teacher please make me well
I don't want to go to hell
Teacher, teacher what can I do
"I don't know boy, it's up to you"
Its' time to free your mind
It's time to cleanse your soul
It's time to free your mind
It's time to cleanse your soul
Yo, Father, forgive me, for I have sinned
I'd rather talk to God but he's out and you're in
It's a little complicated, but Father, don't sweat it
You can hear me out and you can just forget it
Now, I haven't been to church in about ten years
One time, I had to pull my little sister's ear
But I'm not really violent, and it shows
I go for flower power as the stupid song goes
Sometimes I tell a lie, but only when it's true
And I often say things like "shit" and "fuck you"
I like to read a lot of dirty comic books
And I give my dirty teachers a lot of dirty looks
But this is the last thing that I'm ever gonna say
It's embarrassing for me to talk to you this way
But before I forget, before I carry on
I stole a table napkin from a fancy restaurant
Now, please, Father, tell me, tell me what I gotta do
I am full of guilt, and now it's up to you
Now, please, Father, tell me, tell me what I gotta do
I am full of guilt, and now it's up to you, hey!
Just say ten Hail Mary's
Twenty-one Glory Be's
Thirteen Our Father's
And a hundred Amen
Amen, amen, amen, amen
Amen, amen, amen, amen
Amen, amen, amen, wow!

I am only in my teens, I live only for my dreams

Life's a journey anyway

lyrics_full:
Sa wakas ay nakita ko na ang aking hinahanap
Sa wakas ay nakuha ko na ang aking hinahangad
Kay tagal ko nang naghintay at nagsunog ng kilay
Ngayon ay masasabi ko na matamis ang tagumpay
Sa wakas ay nabihag ko na ang aking minamahal
Sa wakas ay natapos ko na ang aking sinimulan
Kay tagal ko nang nagtiyaga
Wala namang nilaga
Sa wakas ay kaya ko nang bumangon sa umaga
O bakit ba ako pinahirapan ng husto
Kay dami-daming kumokontra
Sa bawat kilos ko
Nasan na ba kayo
Tignan ninyo ako
Hindi niyo inakala na ako'y mananalo
Pero salamat na rin sa inyo
Sa wakas ohhh
Sa wakas ohhh
Sa wakas ohhh
Sa wakas oooo

lyrics_full:
[Verse 1]
Pare ko, meron akong problema
'Wag mong sabihing "Na naman?"
In-love ako sa isang kolehiyala
Hindi ko maintindihan
[Bridge]
'Wag na nating idaan
Sa ma-boteng usapan
Lalo lang madaragdagan
Ang sakit ng ulo at bilbil sa tiyan
[Verse 2]
Anong sarap, kami'y naging magkaibigan
Napuno ako ng pag-asa
Yun pala hanggang do'n lang ang kaya
Akala ko ay puwede pa
[Pre-Chorus]
Masakit mang isipin
Kailangang tanggapin
Kung kailan ka naging seryoso
Saka ka niya gagaguhin
[Chorus]
O, Diyos ko, ano ba naman ito?
'Di ba? 'Lang hiya!
Nagmukha akong tanga
Pinaasa niya lang ako
Lecheng pag-ibig 'to
Diyos ko, oh! Ano ba naman ito?
Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh-oh
Woah-ho-woah
[Verse 3]
Sabi niya, ayaw niya munang magkasiyota
Dehins ako naniwala
'Di nagtagal naging gano'n na rin ang tema
Kulang na lang ay sagot niya
[Bridge]
Ba't ba ang labo niya?
'Di ko maipinta
Hanggang kailan maghihintay
Ako ay naiinis na
[Verse 4]
Pero minamahal ko siya, ah-ah
'Di biro, T.L. ako sa kanya
Alam kong nababaduyan ka na sa mga sinasabi ko
Pero sana naman ay maintindihan mo
[Verse 5]
O, pare ko (O, pare ko) mayro'n ka bang maipapayo?
Kung wala ay okay lang (Kung wala ay okay lang)
Kailangan lang ay (Kailangan lang) ang iyong pakikiramay
Andito ka ay ayos na (Andito ka ay ayos na)

lyrics_full:
[Intro]
This next song is all about love
And I wrote it all by myself
They try to tell us we're too young
Too young to really be in love
[Verse 1]
Bahay nami'y maliit lamang
Pero, pero, pero, pero malinis 'to pati sa kusina
Kumain man kami laging sama-sama
Pen-pen-pen de sarapen
De kutsilyo de almasen
Haw-haw-haw de karabaw
De karabaw de batuten
Pengeng singko pambili ng puto
Sa mga tindera ng bicho-bicho
Skyflakes, Coke 500 pahingi ng kiss
Pambayad mo sa jeepney kulang pa ng diyes
[Chorus]
Mahal ko si Toyang
'Pagkat siya'y simple lamang
Kahit namomroblema
Basta't kami ay magkasama
[Verse 2]
Madalas man kaming walang pera
Makita lang ang kislap ng kaniyang mga mata
Ako ay busog na
At nakatambay kami sa Tandang Sora
[Bridge]
Ti ayat ti masya nga baro
(How can I tell you about my loved one?)
Ken balasang nataina
(How can I tell you about my loved one?)
Uray man uray man uray man
(How can I tell you about my loved one?)
Haan unay nga nadonya
(How can I tell you about my loved one?)
[Verse 3]
Bahay nami'y maliit lamang
Pero, pero, pero, pero malinis 'to pati sa kusina
Kumain man kami laging sama-sama
Pen-pen-pen de sarapen
De kutsilyo de almasen
Haw-haw-haw de karabaw
De karabaw de batuten
[Chorus]
Mahal ko si Toyang
'Pagkat siya'y simple lamang
Kahit namomroblema
Basta't kami ay magkasama
[Outro]
Toyang, oh Toyang
Please, pakinggan mo 'ko
I will always be true to you
 (Wooh!)
We were not too young at all!
 (Woh!)

lyrics_full:
[Intro: Ely Buendia]
Isang araw
[Verse 1]
Pumunta ako sa tindahan ni Aling Nena
Para bumili ng suka
Pagbayad ko aking nakita
Isang dalagang nakadungaw sa bintana
Natulala ako, laglag ang puso ko
Nalaglag rin ang sukang hawak ko
Napasigaw si Aling Nena
Ako naman ay parang nakuryenteng pusa!
Ngunit natanggal ang hiya
Nang nakita ko na nakatawa ang dalaga
Panay ang sorry ko sa pagmamadali
Nakalimutan pa ang sukli ko
Pagdating sa bahay, nagalit si nanay
Pero oks lang ako ay inlababo nang tunay
[Chorus]
Tindahan ni Aling Nena
Parang isang kuwentong pampelikula
Mura na at sarisari pa ang itinitinda
Pero ang tanging nais ko ay 'di nabibili ng pera
[Verse 2]
Pumunta ako sa tindahan, kinabukasan
Para makipagkilala
Ngunit sabi ni Aling Nena
Habang maaga'y huwag na raw akong umasa
Anak niya'y aalis na papuntang Canada
Tatlong araw na lang ay ba-bye na
[Chorus]
Tindahan ni Aling Nena
Parang isang kuwentong pampelikula
Mura na at sarisari pa ang itinitinda
Pero ang tanging nais ko ay 'di nabibili ng pera
[Verse 3]
Hindi mapigil ang damdamin
Ako'y nagmakaawang ipakilala
Payag daw siya kung araw-araw
Ay meron akong binibili sa tinda niya
Ako'y pumayag at pinakilala niya
Sa kanyang kaisa-isang dalaga
Ngunit nang makilala, siya'y tumalikod na
At iniwan akong nakatanga
[Chorus]
Tindahan ni Aling Nena
Parang isang kuwentong pampelikula
Mura na at sarisari pa ang itinitinda
Pero ang tanging nais ko ay 'di nabibili ng pera
Tindahan ni Aling Nena
Dito nauubos ang aking pera
Araw-araw ay naghihintay
O Aling Nena, please naman maawa ka-ahh
[Outro]
Alam nyo'ng nangyari?
Wala, ah, wala, ah
Ah-ah-ah-ah (Oh, diyos ko!)
Wala, ah, wala, ah
Ah, ah, ah

Nalaglag rin ang sukang hawak ko
Napasigaw si Aling Nena
Ako naman ay parang nakuryenteng pusa!
Ngunit natanggal ang hiya
Nang nakita ko na nakatawa ang dalaga
Panay ang sorry ko sa pagmamadali
Nakalimutan pa ang sukli ko
Pagdating sa bahay, nagalit si nanay
Pero oks lang ako ay inlababo nang tunay
[Chorus]
Tindahan ni Aling Nena
Parang isang kuwentong pampelikula
Mura na at sarisari pa ang itinitinda
Pero ang tanging nais ko ay 'di nabibili ng pera
[Verse 2]
Pumunta ako sa tindahan, kinabukasan
Para makipagkilala
Ngunit sabi ni Aling Nena
Habang maaga'y huwag na raw akong umasa
Anak niya'y aalis na papuntang Canada
Tatlong araw na lang ay ba-bye na
[Chorus]
Tindahan ni Aling Nena
Parang isang kuwentong pampelikula
Mura na at sarisari pa ang itinitinda
Pero ang tanging nais ko ay 'di nabibili ng pera
[Verse 3]
Hindi mapigil ang damdamin
Ako'y nagmakaawang ipakilala
Payag daw siya kung araw-araw
Ay meron akong binibili sa tinda niya
Ako'y pumayag at pinakilala niya
Sa kanyang kaisa-isang dalaga
Ngunit nang makilala, siya'y tumalikod na
At iniwan akong nakatanga
[Chorus]
Tindahan ni Aling Nena
Parang isang kuwentong pampelikula
Mura na at sarisari pa ang itinitinda
Pero ang tanging nais ko ay 'di nabibili ng pera
Tindahan ni Aling Nena
Dito nauubos ang aking pera
Araw-araw ay naghihintay
O Aling Nena, please naman maawa ka-ahh
[Outro]
Alam nyo'ng nangyari?
Wala, ah, wala, ah
Ah-ah-ah-ah (Oh, diyos ko!)
Wala, ah, wala, ah
Ah, ah, ah

lyrics_full:
[Verse 1]
In love na naman si Shirley
Sa binatang maganda ang kotse
Sila'y nag-date sa may Antipolo kagabi
Lagi na siyang naka-dress sa eskuwela
Nakaayos palagi ang buhok niya
Lumulutang sa ulap 'pag naglalakad sa kalye
[Chorus]
Ganyan ma-in love, love, love, love, love
Ganyan ma-in love, love, love, love, love
Ganyan ma-in love, love, love, love, love
Ganyan ma-in love
[Verse 2]
The next week, magsiyota na sila
Magkaholding hands papunta sa C.A.S.A.A
Kung maglandian akala mo'y walang katabi
[Chorus]
Ganyan ma-in love (Love, love, love, love, love)
Ganyan ma-in love (Love, love, love, love, love)
Ganyan ma-in love (Love, love, love, love, love)
Ganyan ma-in love, oh
[Post-Chorus]
Oh, oh, oh
[Chorus]
Love (In love na naman si Shirley)
Ganyan ma-in love (In love na naman si Shirley)
Ganyan ma-in love (In love na naman si Shirley)
Ganyan ma-in love (In love na naman si Shirley)
Ganyan ma-in love (In love na naman si Shirley)
[Bridge]
Ngunit isang araw
Sa may SM sila'y nag-away
Nagtampuhan, may iyakan
Hanggang maubos ang laway (Sa away)
Hiwalay silang umuwi at sila'y nag-break (Oh)
[Verse 3]
After three days
Nag-ring ang telepono ni Shirley
Si binata ngayo'y nagso-sorry
Ilang minuto na lang at sila'y mag-on na uli
[Chorus]
Ganyan ma-in love (Love, love, love, love, love)
Ganyan ma-in love (Love, love, love, love, love)
Ganyan ma-in love (Love, love, love, love, love)
Ganyan ma-in love (Love, love, love, love, love)
Ganyan ma-in love, love, love, love, uh
Love, love, love, love
Ganyan ma-in love, love, love, love
Ganyan ma-in love, hey

In love na naman si Shirley
In love na naman si Shirley

In love na naman si Shirley
In love na naman si Shirley
In love na naman si Shirley

lyrics_full:
[Verse 1]
I was born upside down
I felt my grandma put my feet on the ground
They put a spoon in my mouth
And everyone was shocked to hear me shout
Well I knew I couldn't take
All the dog food that they make
I'd just as soon as put myself on a stake and burn
[Chorus]
I saw it comin' around
I saw it comin' around, yeah
I saw it comin' around
So I just, yeah
Shook my head and walked away
[Verse 2]
I grew up in a town
Where everybody tried to push me around
The girls were alright but the guys were tough
They're always buggin' me with macho stuff
Well, I ain't no stupid fighter
I go for flower power
I've been running every race just to save my face, yeah
[Chorus]
I saw it comin' around
I saw it comin' around, yeah
I saw it comin' around
So I just, yeah
Shook my head and walked away
[Bridge]
Well, they try to see if you care
It's just a matter of not begging for more
You know it's really suicidal to just give in
With people, you can never really be sure
[Verse 3]
O-hoh, when it gets down to this, they'll eat you up
When the words get in your head, they'll stitch you up
It's a saving grace to have enough
When you find yourself in a compromising spot
You should know, you shouldn't take
All that dog food that they make
You'd just as soon as put yourself on a stake and burn
[Chorus]
You'll see it comin' around
You'll see it comin', comin' around
When you, oh, when you see it coming around
You just, yeah
Shake yer head and walk away!
[Outro]
Yeah! (Shake yer head and walk away)
Alright!
Shake, shake, shake
(Shake yer head)
Shake, shake, shake
(Shake yer head)
Yes, the one you think with
Ohh c'mon, c'mon

lyrics_full:
[Verse 1]
Pare ko, meron akong problema
'Wag mong sabihing "na naman?"
In love ako sa isang kolehiyala
Hindi ko maintindihan
'Wag na nating idaan sa ma-boteng usapan
Lalo lang madaragdagan
Ang sakit ng ulo at bilbil sa tiyan
[Verse 2]
Anong sarap kami'y naging magkaibigan
Napuno ako ng pag-asa
'Yun pala, haggang do'n lang ang kaya
Akala ko ay pwede pa
[Pre-Chorus]
Masakit mang isipin kailangang tanggapin?
Kung kailan ka naging seryoso
Saka ka niya gagaguhin!
[Chorus]
Oh, jusko, ano ba naman ito?
'Di ba? Tangina!
Nagmukha akong tanga
Pinaasa niya lang ako
Letseng pag-ibig 'to!
Jusko, ano ba naman ito?
[Verse 3]
Sabi niya ayaw niya munang magkasiyota
De-hins ako naniwala
'Di nagtagal, naging gano'n na rin ang tema
Kulang na lang ay sagot niya
[Pre-Chorus]
Ba't ba ang labo niya?
'Di ko mapinta
Hanggang kailan maghihintay?
Ako ay nabuburat na!
[Bridge]
Pero, minamahal ko siya
'Di biro, T.L. ako sa kaniya
Alam kong nababaduyan ka na sa mga sinasabi ko
Pero sana naman ay maintindihan mo
[Verse 4]
Oh, pare ko, meron ka bang maipapayo?
Kung wala ay okay lang
Kailangan lang ay ang iyong pakikiramay
Andito ka ay ayos na
[Pre-Chorus]
Masakit mang isipin kailangang tanggapin?
Kung kailan ka naging seryoso
Saka ka niya gagaguhin!
[Chorus]
Oh, jusko, ano ba naman ito?
'Di ba? Tangina!
Nagmukha akong tanga
Pinaasa niya lang ako
Letseng pag-ibig 'to!
Jusko, ano ba naman ito?
[Outro]
'Di ba? Tangina!
Nagmukha akong tanga
Pinaasa niya lang ako
Letseng pag-ibig 'to!
Jusko, ano ba naman ito?

Anong sarap kami'y naging magkaibigan
Napuno ako ng pag-asa
'Yun pala, haggang do'n lang ang kaya
Akala ko ay pwede pa
[Pre-Chorus]
Masakit mang isipin kailangang tanggapin?
Kung kailan ka naging seryoso
Saka ka niya gagaguhin!
[Chorus]
Oh, jusko, ano ba naman ito?
'Di ba? Tangina!
Nagmukha akong tanga
Pinaasa niya lang ako
Letseng pag-ibig 'to!
Jusko, ano ba naman ito?
[Verse 3]
Sabi niya ayaw niya munang magkasiyota
De-hins ako naniwala
'Di nagtagal, naging gano'n na rin ang tema
Kulang na lang ay sagot niya
[Pre-Chorus]
Ba't ba ang labo niya?
'Di ko mapinta
Hanggang kailan maghihintay?
Ako ay nabuburat na!
[Bridge]
Pero, minamahal ko siya
'Di biro, T.L. ako sa kaniya
Alam kong nababaduyan ka na sa mga sinasabi ko
Pero sana naman ay maintindihan mo
[Verse 4]
Oh, pare ko, meron ka bang maipapayo?
Kung wala ay okay lang
Kailangan lang ay ang iyong pakikiramay
Andito ka ay ayos na
[Pre-Chorus]
Masakit mang isipin kailangang tanggapin?
Kung kailan ka naging seryoso
Saka ka niya gagaguhin!

Jusko, ano ba naman ito?

'Di ba? Tangina!
Nagmukha akong tanga
Pinaasa niya lang ako
Letseng pag-ibig 'to!
Jusko, ano ba naman ito?

lyrics_full:
[Intro: Ely Buendia]
Isang araw
[Verse 1]
Pumunta ako sa tindahan ni Aling Nena
Para bumili ng suka
Pagbayad ko aking nakita
Isang dalagang nakadungaw sa bintana
Natulala ako, laglag ang puso ko
Nalaglag rin ang sukang hawak ko
Napasigaw si Aling Nena
Ako naman ay parang nakuryenteng pusa!
Ngunit natanggal ang hiya
Nang nakita ko na nakatawa ang dalaga
Panay ang sorry ko sa pagmamadali
Nakalimutan pa ang sukli ko
Pagdating sa bahay, nagalit si nanay
Pero oks lang ako ay inlababo nang tunay
[Chorus]
Tindahan ni Aling Nena
Parang isang kuwentong pampelikula
Mura na at sarisari pa ang itinitinda
Pero ang tanging nais ko ay 'di nabibili ng pera
[Verse 2]
Pumunta ako sa tindahan, kinabukasan
Para makipagkilala
Ngunit sabi ni Aling Nena
Habang maaga'y huwag na raw akong umasa
Anak niya'y aalis na papuntang Canada
Tatlong araw na lang ay ba-bye na
[Chorus]
Tindahan ni Aling Nena
Parang isang kuwentong pampelikula
Mura na at sarisari pa ang itinitinda
Pero ang tanging nais ko ay 'di nabibili ng pera
[Verse 3]
Hindi mapigil ang damdamin
Ako'y nagmakaawang ipakilala
Payag daw siya kung araw-araw
Ay meron akong binibili sa tinda niya
Ako'y pumayag at pinakilala niya
Sa kanyang kaisa-isang dalaga
Ngunit nang makilala, siya'y tumalikod na
At iniwan akong nakatanga
[Chorus]
Tindahan ni Aling Nena
Parang isang kuwentong pampelikula
Mura na at sarisari pa ang itinitinda
Pero ang tanging nais ko ay 'di nabibili ng pera
Tindahan ni Aling Nena
Dito nauubos ang aking pera
Araw-araw ay naghihintay
O Aling Nena, please naman maawa ka-ahh
[Outro]
Alam nyo'ng nangyari?
Wala, ah, wala, ah
Ah-ah-ah-ah (Oh, diyos ko!)
Wala, ah, wala, ah
Ah, ah, ah

lyrics_full:
[Verse 1]
In love na naman si Shirley
Sa binatang maganda ang kotse
Sila'y nag-date sa may Antipolo kagabi
Lagi na siyang naka-dress sa eskuwela
Nakaayos palagi ang buhok niya
Lumulutang sa ulap 'pag naglalakad sa kalye
[Chorus]
Ganyan ma-in love, love, love, love, love
Ganyan ma-in love, love, love, love, love
Ganyan ma-in love, love, love, love, love
Ganyan ma-in love
[Verse 2]
The next week, magsiyota na sila
Magkaholding hands papunta sa C.A.S.A.A
Kung maglandian akala mo'y walang katabi
[Chorus]
Ganyan ma-in love (Love, love, love, love, love)
Ganyan ma-in love (Love, love, love, love, love)
Ganyan ma-in love (Love, love, love, love, love)
Ganyan ma-in love, oh
[Post-Chorus]
Oh, oh, oh
[Chorus]
Love (In love na naman si Shirley)
Ganyan ma-in love (In love na naman si Shirley)
Ganyan ma-in love (In love na naman si Shirley)
Ganyan ma-in love (In love na naman si Shirley)
Ganyan ma-in love (In love na naman si Shirley)

Ngunit isang araw
Sa may SM sila'y nag-away
Nagtampuhan, may iyakan
Hanggang maubos ang laway (Sa away)
Hiwalay silang umuwi at sila'y nag-break (Oh)

After three days
Nag-ring ang telepono ni Shirley
Si binata ngayo'y nagso-sorry
Ilang minuto na lang at sila'y mag-on na uli

Ganyan ma-in love (Love, love, love, love, love)

lyrics_full:
[Verse 1]
I was born upside down
I felt my grandma put my feet on the ground
They put a spoon in my mouth
And everyone was shocked to hear me shout
Well I knew I couldn't take
All the dog food that they make
I'd just as soon as put myself on a stake and burn
[Chorus]
I saw it comin' around
I saw it comin' around, yeah
I saw it comin' around
So I just, yeah
Shook my head and walked away
[Verse 2]
I grew up in a town
Where everybody tried to push me around
The girls were alright but the guys were tough
They're always buggin' me with macho stuff
Well, I ain't no stupid fighter
I go for flower power
I've been running every race just to save my face, yeah
[Chorus]
I saw it comin' around
I saw it comin' around, yeah
I saw it comin' around
So I just, yeah
Shook my head and walked away
[Bridge]
Well, they try to see if you care
It's just a matter of not begging for more
You know it's really suicidal to just give in
With people, you can never really be sure
[Verse 3]
O-hoh, when it gets down to this, they'll eat you up
When the words get in your head, they'll stitch you up
It's a saving grace to have enough
When you find yourself in a compromising spot
You should know, you shouldn't take
All that dog food that they make
You'd just as soon as put yourself on a stake and burn
[Chorus]
You'll see it comin' around
You'll see it comin', comin' around
When you, oh, when you see it coming around
You just, yeah
Shake yer head and walk away!
[Outro]
Yeah! (Shake yer head and walk away)
Alright!
Shake, shake, shake
(Shake yer head)
Shake, shake, shake
(Shake yer head)
Yes, the one you think with
Ohh c'mon, c'mon

lyrics_full:
[Intro]
Chu-rut, chut-chu-ru-rut
Chut-chu-ru-rut
Chut-chu-ru-rut
Chut-chu-ru, chut-chu-ru, chut-chu-ru
[Verse 1]
'Di mapigil paggalaw, nagwawala, nagdadabog
Hoy pare, dahan-dahan lang, muntik ka nang mahulog
May taong bumubulong, meron ding sumisigaw
Meron pang nag-Iingles na parang Kanong hilaw
Bigla na lang natutulala, umiiyak, tumatawa
Meron ding nagnanakaw at nawawalan ng pera
[Pre-Chorus]
Sumusuray 'pag lumakad, nadadapa, nauuntog
'Pag dalawin ng antok, kahit saan natutulog
May taong naggagalas, parang luko-luko
Kung saan ka man abutin, CR mo ang buong mundo
[Chorus]
Alkohol, alkohol, utak mo'y buhol-buhol (Chu-rut, chut-chu-ru-rut)
Alkohol, alkohol, utak mo'y buhol-buhol (Chut, chut-chu-ru-rut, chut-chu-ru-rut)
Alkohol, alkohol, alkohol (Chut-chu-ru, chut-chu-ru, chut-chu-ru)
[Post-Chorus]
Uh
Yeah
[Verse 2]
'Di mapigil ang bibig, pati sikreto nasasabi
Nasusuka, kumakanta, napapraning sa isang tabi
"Kaya ko pa, kaya pa," 'yan ang laging sagot niya
Nananaginip nang gising, pumupungay ang mata
Konting alak nalulunod, lumalakas ang loob
Ume-ekis, gumagapang, natitisod, sumusubsob
[Pre-Chorus]
Labo-labo, sari-sari, may naghahanap ng away
Binabangungot nang gising, meron ding namamatay
Lumiliwanag, dumidilim, bumabait, tumatapang
Umiikot ang tingin, utak mo'y kinakalawang
[Chorus]
Alkohol, alkohol, utak mo'y buhol-buhol (Chu-rut, chut-chu-ru-rut)
Alkohol, alkohol, utak mo'y buhol-buhol (Chut, chut-chu-ru-rut, chut-chu-ru-rut)
Alkohol, alkohol, alkohol (Chut-chu-ru, chut-chu-ru, chut-chu-ru)
[Post-Chorus]
Uh
Uh
Uh
Uh
[Pre-Chorus]
Lumiliwanag, dumidilim, nadadapa, nauuntog
'Pag dalawin ng antok, kahit saan natutulog
At may hangover pa, paggising masakit ang ulo
Paano ba ako nakauwi? Shit, kailangan ko ng yelo
[Chorus]
Alkohol, alkohol, utak mo'y buhol-buhol (Chu-rut, chut-chu-ru-rut) (Hoy, hoy)
Alkohol, alkohol, utak mo'y buhol-buhol (Chut, chut-chu-ru-rut, chut-chu-ru-rut) (Yeah)

Alkohol, alkohol, alkohol, alkohol, alkohol (Chut-chu-ru, chut-chu-ru, chut-chu-ru) (Hoy, yeah, yeah, hoy)
[Outro]
[Non-Lyrical Vocals]

lyrics_full:
[Intro]
I wish I could go back to those fairy book tales
Forget the real world awhile
And seek the seas of the talking whales
A place of wishing wells and magic spells
A place of wishing wells and magic spells
Where everything starts out once upon a time
Long, long ago and ends happily ever after
[Verse 1]
I could go up the hill and run with Jill
The giant could smell I'm no Englishman
Cinderella danced with me at the ball
I told the queen of hearts about my plan
I travelled wonderland with Alice
I met with Snow White in the woods
I flew with Peter Pan in never, never land
Picked some berries with miss Red Riding Hood
[Chorus]
I wish I could go back to those fairy book tales
Forget the real world awhile
And seek the seas of the talking whales
A place of wishing wells and magic spells
A place of wishing wells and magic spells
Where everything starts out once upon a time
Long, long ago and ends happily ever after
[Verse 2]
I could be an outlaw in the west
Save the damsels in distress
We could sleep a hundred years
I could wake you up with a kiss
We'll swim the seven seas

lyrics_full:
You can take me to the prom, promise not to tell your mom
Mama never tells you why, but she kicks you in the eye
I don't think she understands, I just wanna hold your hand
I don't even own a car, so we couldn't get that far
Father Marcus said to me, just confess and you'll be free
Sit you down upon my my lap, tell me your sins just like that
He said "Babe, you know the rules, you're livin' in a Catholic school"
All the teachers say you're fine, but they don't have dirty minds
I am only in my teens, I live only for my dreams
I cannot be made to stay
Life's a journey anyway
Life's a journey anyway, hey
[Guitar Solo]
Teacher, teacher please make me well
I don't want to go to hell
Teacher, teacher what can I do
"I don't know boy, it's up to you"
Its' time to free your mind
It's time to cleanse your soul
It's time to free your mind
It's time to cleanse your soul
Yo, Father, forgive me, for I have sinned
I'd rather talk to God but he's out and you're in
It's a little complicated, but Father, don't sweat it
You can hear me out and you can just forget it
Now, I haven't been to church in about ten years
One time, I had to pull my little sister's ear
But I'm not really violent, and it shows
I go for flower power as the stupid song goes
Sometimes I tell a lie, but only when it's true
And I often say things like "shit" and "fuck you"
I like to read a lot of dirty comic books
And I give my dirty teachers a lot of dirty looks
But this is the last thing that I'm ever gonna say
It's embarrassing for me to talk to you this way
But before I forget, before I carry on
I stole a table napkin from a fancy restaurant
Now, please, Father, tell me, tell me what I gotta do
I am full of guilt, and now it's up to you
Now, please, Father, tell me, tell me what I gotta do

Wala namang nilaga

Kay dami-daming kumokontra
Sa bawat kilos ko
Nasan na ba kayo
Tignan ninyo ako
Hindi niyo inakala na ako'y mananalo
Pero salamat na rin sa inyo

Sa wakas oooo

Wala akong bahay
Wala pang maari
Nasaan ang magulang?
Ano ang tunay kong pangalan?

Ay, ay, ay, ay, ay-ayoko, ayoko, ayoko, itay!
[Verse 2: Eraserheads]
Hari ng kalye
Walang relihiyon
'Wag panghimasukan
'Wag na 'wag pakikialaman

Sa kanya, makakatikim kami ng ginhawa
Pagkain, malaking bahay
Kotse, alahas

Para magkalaman ang tiyan? (Nasagasaan ng pison)
Pa-hassle pa sa pulis (Ay, mukhang birhen ang misis mo)
Para may matirahan (Pa'no ko magagawa sa sales lady 'yon?)
Wating na buhay 'to hanggang kailan (O sa kolehiyala?)
Wating na buhay 'to hanggang kailan (Sobra naman ang mga media)

Wala akong bahay
Wala pang makain
Nasaan ang magulang?
Ano ang tunay kong pangalan?

Kailan ba tayo titira ng high-tech?
Ano, tulad ng [?]
[Verse 2: Eraserheads]
Hari ng Kalye, walang dinidiyos
'Wag panghimasukan
'Wag na 'wag pakikialaman
[Bridge]
Wala na tayong lulusutan, kumalas na tayo
Lalaban tayo, wating tayo, 'di ba?
Wala akong kaibigan
[Chorus: Eraserheads]
Kailangan bang magnakaw (Hindi kita kaibigan)
Para magkalaman ang tiyan? (Lahat tayo naggagamitan lang)
Pa-hassle pa sa pulis (Trip lang 'to)
Para may matirahan (Everything is under control, I don't)
Wating na buhay 'to hanggang kailan (Trust me, aayusin ko silang lahat)
Wating na buhay 'to hanggang kailan (Buhay 'to, gusto ko nang magpakamatay)
[Instrumental Break]
[Outro: Carmina]
Sa gitna ng gulo, pakinggan ang puso
Isang saglit lang, sinta
Magpadaloy sa agos ng damdamin
Limutin mo na ang dilim ng mundo
Hawakan ang akong kamay
Sa malayo tayo ay maglalakbay

lyrics_full:
[Verse 1]
I've been standing here
Waiting for the bus on a Saturday
Laundry on my back, ultraviolet rays
Like I'm posing for a shot in a magazine
What the hell does it mean?
[Refrain]
I'm a travelling man, straight from the can
I'm a thousand miles away
From my number one fan
My folks are getting tight
Won't let me out at night
You can't avoid the complications
When there's no reason at all
[Pre-Chorus]
When the right-hand strikes, we fly
I'll drink my beer, I wipe my tears
Southbound in the sky
[Chorus]
Another karma, another reason
Gets you every day
The only time that you can talk
You ain't got nothing to say
Well, I'm caught up in a stupid game that I can't play
It's just a waste of time but I'm in it anyway
[Verse 2]
I've been sitting here watching the signs
Too many cars at night
Belching in the moonlight
We're doing ninety as the sky turns to grey
Some people look like bees
Buzzing by the highway
[Bridge]
The wheels are rolling like a rolling stone, alone
I choose the road less travelled on now
[Verse 3]
I'm lying here waiting for the day
On the second deck
Dreaming of a girl from a fairytale
Chain around my neck
A ride is all it takes
But pains get in the way

lyrics_full:
I dream of all the years decaying
I dream of bitter endings, street smiles
Hateful goodbyes
Demented lies
I dream of guns with red round triggers
And bullets that don't ever miss
And wounds that won't heal
Hands that won't feel
Is this hallowed ground sinking?
Will tears stop their falling?
Can I speak the truth if they cut my tongue?
One night you wake up you're screaming
With trembling hands
And the frightening part
Is you don't understand
And as we go on living
Each day we must tell ourselves
That we have to carry on
And every night as we lay down
And deliver our prayers
To live to see another day
But then down here no one cares
And your troubles will be found
Buried six feet in the ground
We dream a land of milk and money
Of coffee mornings bright and sunny
Sex on the phone
You're not alone
And every night as we lay down
And deliver our prayers
We live to live to see another day
But when nightmares come around
We'll be drinking all our wine
Buried six feet in the ground

I'm shaking hands with Kris today
I'm smoking salmons anyway

Aloha-loha, Milky Way!

That my stars just won't let go

Day by day
When I see you, I see 
red and green

 Ah-he-he-he-hey!

You're far away
Here come the loony bin
Come to take me away
You put a scar in my twisted face
In the yearbook I looked out of place
I see my letter burning in your hand
It took me twenty five years just to understand
Blue is the color of my skin
Blue is the color of my skin
Blue is the color of my
Woah!

lyrics_full:
I dream of all the years decaying
I dream of bitter endings, street smiles
Hateful goodbyes
Demented lies
I dream of guns with red round triggers
And bullets that don't ever miss
And wounds that won't heal
Hands that won't feel
Is this hallowed ground sinking?
Will tears stop their falling?
Can I speak the truth if they cut my tongue?
One night you wake up you're screaming
With trembling hands
And the frightening part
Is you don't understand
And as we go on living
Each day we must tell ourselves
That we have to carry on
And every night as we lay down
And deliver our prayers
To live to see another day
But then down here no one cares
And your troubles will be found
Buried six feet in the ground
We dream a land of milk and money
Of coffee mornings bright and sunny
Sex on the phone
You're not alone
And every night as we lay down
And deliver our prayers
We live to live to see another day
But when nightmares come around
We'll be drinking all our wine
Buried six feet in the ground

It's alright

It's alright

It's alright

lyrics_full:
I'm riding winds at sonic speed
I'm seeing things you won't believe
I'm lighting torches with a smile
And having donuts for dessert
I'm laughing at the colored wheel
And stealing things that I can steal
I'm painting portraits on the wall
And waiting for the fruit to fall
Well, I talked to my baby on a Saturday night
She said it doesn't matter what is left or what is right
I'm rubbing elbows with my knees
I'm writing books about disease
I'm crying like a little child
'Cause cowgirl tuna makes me wild
I'm laughing at the colored wheel
And stealing things that I can steal
I'm shaking hands with Kris today
I'm smoking salmons anyway
Well, I talked to my baby on a Saturday night
My, my, my, what a beautiful sight
The world is really ugly on the other side
She said it doesn't matter what is wrong or what is right
Aloha-loha, Milky Way!
Aloha-loha, Milky Way!
Aloha-loha, Milky Way!
Aloha-loha, Milky Way!

lyrics_full:
[Chorus]
Lift your head, baby, don't be scared
Of the things that could go wrong along the way
You'll get by with a smile
You can't win at everything but you can try
[Verse 1]
Baby, you don't have to worry
'Cause there ain't no need to hurry
No one ever said that there's an easy way
When they're closing all their doors
And they don't want you anymore
It sounds funny but I'll say it anyway
[Chorus]
Girl, I'll stay through the bad times
Even if I have to fetch you everyday
We'll get by with a smile
You can never be too happy in this life
[Verse 2]
'Cause in a world where everybody
Hates a happy ending story
It's a wonder love can make the world go round
But don't let it bring you down
And turn your face into a frown
Get along with a little prayer and a song
[Bridge]
(Too, doo-doo-doo)
Let me hear you sing it
(Too, doo-doo-doo)
[Verse 2]
'Cause in a world where everybody
Hates a happy ending story
It's a wonder love can make the world go round
But don't let it bring you down
And turn your face into a frown
Get along with a little prayer and a song
[Chorus]
Lift your head, baby, don't be scared
Of the things that could go wrong along the way
You'll get by with a smile
So now it's time to kiss away those tears, goodbye
[Outro]
(Too, doo-doo-doo)
Let me hear you sing it
(Too, doo-doo-doo)
With a smile

lyrics_full:
[Verse 1]
There's a fruitcake for everybody
There's a fruitcake for everyone
There are B-sides to every story
If you decide to have some fun
[Chorus]
Take a bite
It's alright
There's some brandy and star margarine to make it bright
Take a bite
It's alright
A little lovin' and some fruit to bake
Life is a piece of cake
[Verse 2]
It's the season for being happy
But the reason is dead and gone
If the reason for being happy
Takes a backseat when the season's done
[Chorus]
Just take a bite
It's alright
Taste the taste that sent all mothers giggling in sheer delight
Take a bite
It's alright
A little lovin and some fruit to bake
Life is a piece of cake
[Post-Chorus]
Everybody, everywhere, people do you really care?
Christmas time has once again arrived
Everybody, everywhere, people do you really care?
Christmas time has once again arrived
Mistletoe and a little snow
But we don't get it there at fruitcake heights
Mistletoe and a little snow
But we don't get it there at fruitcake heights
[Bridge]
Stars are falling down from heaven
But it's nowhere near our town
Miracles are falling down from heaven
But it's nowhere near our town
[Verse 3]
There's a fruitcake in everybody
There's a fruitcake in everyone
There are B-sides to every story
And that story has just begun
[Chorus]
Just take a bite
It's alright
Taste the taste that sent all mothers giggling in sheer delight
Take a bite
It's alright
A little lovin' is riding all along
She ran away from home

lyrics_full:
[Verse 1]
Shadow is my friend
He'll be with me
'Til the end
I don't have to
Make amends
Like that river
'Round the bed
He won't let me down
Just chase me around
He won't get on my nerves
If it gets any worse
[Verse 2]
People are so strange
Everybody is deranged
Everytime I try to speak
They don't get it for a week
I'll get out of bed
Sing songs in my head
I'll wait for the sun
To shine on the one
Who never disagrees
And likes everything he sees
Let's go for a ride
The road is long and wide

lyrics_full:
[Verse 1: Raimund Marasigan]
We left town to look for someone who would listen
To some songs we cooked in our magic kitchen
Change was forbidden, it wasn't clear
Everyone must sing the same old songs every year
[Verse 2: Raimund Marasigan]
Like a spell, the sounds came dancing in our heads
Painting pictures as we slept our souls were fed
In a music box we kept our secret songs
Packed our bags, we took the van and before long
[Chorus: Raimund Marasigan]
Tide shift and slide into another
Like a flat tire twisting fate
An innocent chance
In the destiny dance
Take you down the wizard gates
[Verse 3: Raimund Marasigan]
Never speak to strangers, often I was told
They looked desperately harmless, I felt bold
Sometime later alligator we were friends
Shares some stories, tales of worries, somehow it all blends
[Bridge: Raimund Marasigan]
Everyone seemed all right
Situation stable
Everyone seemed all right
Never turns out to be quite simple
[Refrain: Raimund Marasigan]
We had to get back
We packed the wrong bags in the sack
We had to get back
And she tagged along
[Chorus: Raimund Marasigan]
Tide shift and slide into another
Like a flat tire twisting fate
An innocent chance
In the destiny dance
Take you down the wizard gates
[Refrain: Raimund Marasigan]
We had to get back
We packed the wrong bags in the sack
We had to get back
And she tagged along, she tagged along, she tagged along
[Chorus: Raimund Marasigan]
Tide shift and slide into another
Like a flat tire twisting fate
An innocent chance
In the destiny dance
Take you down the wizard gates
Take you down the wizard gates
Take you down the wizard gates

lyrics_full:
Baker, baker, baker boy
Bake a girl, bake a boy
[Verse 1]
They come to me for donuts and blueberry pie
They love my creme merengue
And my fresh baked rye
[Chorus]
Have a taste, have a taste
Help yourself, feel free
It’s just you and me
In the fabulous bakery yeah (yeah)
[Verse 2]
Try the maja-blanca and my leche flan
I never use brown sugar or milk from a can
[Chorus]
Have a taste, have a taste
Help yourself, feel free
It’s just you and me
In the fabulous bakery yeah (yeah)
[Bridge]
Last Christmas, papa died
In a freak baking accident, how I cried
Too much flour and too much yeast
A costly mistake for the perfect fruitcake
The fabulous baker boy, that's me
Yeah, that's me
Baker, baker, baker boy
Bake a girl, bake a boy
[Verse 3]
Bake you this, bake you that
I don't care if you get fat
Bake it fast, bake it quick
Shadow jumped over a candlestick
[Spoken]
Good morning Mr. Baker Boy
Good morning to you too sir
And welcome to the bakery
Oh thank you but you know
As a baker myself I've always wondered
What are some of your secret ingredients
For baking your fantastic fruitcake?
First you have to love what you doing..
Of course you have to love what you doing
Of course but ah what else? Besides technical matters you know
First you have to taste what you're doing
Ok, and I guess the next thing that you're
Going to say is you have to smell what you're doing
No, next is you have to love yourself and feel free
Feel free... Feel free to do what if I may ask?
Feel free to have a taste and hop yourself in
Ahh ok, feel free to taste and to take a bite
This is very very important
Yeah! Take a bite of the fruitcake
But wait a minute before you take a bite of the fruitcake
You have to bake the fruitcake first right?!
Yes, to start baking the fruitcake we need fruits correct?
Umm, yes, that is also correct
That's a good assumption
Yeah! That's a very great assumption
Those fruits, they come from my friend the fruit fairy
The fruit fairy, uhh, he or she?
Uhh she... He lives around the corner around the bend
Ok, ok, ok... Okay, so what else is the possible secret
For the fruitcake that you make, shall we
Let me see... Oh, my good friends, the mother packers
Wait a minute, I'm beginning to wonder
Are you really the one who makes the fruitcakes or
Is it the ones that are in-
I actually order them from the Swiss house
And then I repackage them here
Wait a minute, wait a minute
So that means you're not who actually makes the fruitcakes?
Am I supposed to be the one who makes the fruitcake?

lyrics_full:
Big dipper North of nowhere
Outside the room
Inside my mind
I, look forward to tomorrow
But can I leave yesterday behind
How it feels so strange
To have grown and change
Now it's not the same
Cause time slips and slides
Into another place and try
As we might to understand each other
Doesn't really matter where you are
It always seems so very far
'Cause you're lightyears away
You're lightyears away
From me
Little dipper South of somewhere
It looks much closer than it really is
I held it in my hands
But you're forever out of reach
Far as the eye can see
Nothing is meant to be
Doesn't mean much to me
But oh, if I only had a rocket ship to fly
I'd be right there in a minute
But it doesn't really matter where you are
However near is still so far
It's like you're light years away
You're light years away from me

lyrics_full:
[Verse 1]
Wake up little darlin', it's Christmas morning
The sun is up, it's time to open
All the gifts that you've been given
[Verse 2]
You had been dreaming
Angels are singing
But now they're gone
And once again
It's time to go on with our lives
[Chorus]
Let's hope that the next year will be better
Than last year
And somehow we'd all get by
And maybe the time will come when
We won't need to pretend
To be happy for just a while
[Verse 3]
World keeps on turning
Fools keep on wishing
And when you wake
You'll find that everything
Is not what we dreamed them to be
[Instrumental Break]
[Chorus]
Let's hope that the next year will be better
Than last year
And somehow we'd all get by
And maybe the time will come when
We won't need to pretend
To be happy for just a while
[Verse 4]
Wake up little darlin', it's Christmas morning
So rise and shine
Let's make the most of happy holidays
Or maybe I should just let you dream
For a while longer
Wherever's a better place than here
Here
Here
Here

lyrics_full:
[Verse 1]
I've been standing here
Waiting for the bus on a Saturday
Laundry on my back, ultraviolet rays
Like I'm posing for a shot in a magazine
What the hell does it mean?
[Refrain]
I'm a travelling man, straight from the can
I'm a thousand miles away
From my number one fan
My folks are getting tight
Won't let me out at night
You can't avoid the complications
When there's no reason at all
[Pre-Chorus]
When the right-hand strikes, we fly
I'll drink my beer, I wipe my tears
Southbound in the sky
[Chorus]
Another karma, another reason
Gets you every day
The only time that you can talk
You ain't got nothing to say
Well, I'm caught up in a stupid game that I can't play
It's just a waste of time but I'm in it anyway
[Verse 2]
I've been sitting here watching the signs
Too many cars at night
Belching in the moonlight
We're doing ninety as the sky turns to grey
Some people look like bees
Buzzing by the highway
[Bridge]
The wheels are rolling like a rolling stone, alone
I choose the road less travelled on now
[Verse 3]
I'm lying here waiting for the day
On the second deck
Dreaming of a girl from a fairytale
Chain around my neck
A ride is all it takes
But pains get in the way

[Intro]
I hope we could spend more time together
A few hours is better than never
If we could only make it longer
[Hook]
A whole day would be fine
A whole day would be fine
A whole day would be fine

Sit outside and watch the moon

lyrics_full:
Dati'y walang takot kang sumubok
Ng kahit anong gawain
Walang kasawa-sawa sa mga bagay-bagay
Di na kailangang isipin
Kung anong mangyayari
Walang pakialam kahit anong kalabasan
Sa oras na tanso, di nanghihinayang
Heto na ngayon, punong puno ang utak
Ang daming ninanais, ang daming kailangan
Pero walang panahon
Slow, it hurts so fine
Slow, I'm killing time
My lemon lime
Ang mga tao sa buhay mo
Ay nagdaraan lamang
Umaalis, dumarating, walang naiiwan
Ang kwento ng pag-ibig
Ay kumusta at paalam
Ngayo'y alam mo na kung paano mag-isa
Natagpuan ang kasagutan
Sa mga katanungan
Lahat ay nangyayari tamang oras at lugar
Pero iba ang nasasabi
Unti-unti mo nang naiintindihan
Ang payo ng magulang
Slow, it hurts so fine
Slow, I'm killing time
My lemon lime
Di mo kailangan unawain
Ang aking mga gawain
Di mo pwedeng ikahon ang pagod at puyat ko
Kung may nais kang malaman
Ba't di mo rin subukan
Makinig ka nang mabuti, tumatanda na ang pusa ko
Kahihintay sa linya ng telepono
Slow, it hurts so fine
Slow, I'm killing time
My lemon lime

lyrics_full:
[Verse 1]
Minsan sa may Kalayaan tayo'y nagkatagpuan
May mga sariling gimik
At kaniya-kaniyang hangad sa buhay
Sa ilalim ng iisang bubong
Mga sikretong ibinubulong
Kahit na anong mangyari
Kahit na saan ka man patungo
[Pre-Chorus]
Ngunit ngayon
Kay bilis maglaho ng kahapon
Sana'y 'wag kalimutan
Ang ating mga pinagsamahan
[Chorus]
At kung sakaling gipitin
Ay laging iisipin na
Minsan tayo ay naging
Tunay na magkaibigan
[Instrumental Break]
[Verse 2]
Minsan ay parang wala nang bukas sa buhay natin
Inuman hanggang sa magdamag
Na para bang tayo'y mauubusan
Sa ilalim ng bilog na buwan
Mga tiyan nati'y walang laman
Ngunit kahit na walang pera
Ang bawat gabi'y anong saya
[Pre-Chorus]
Ngunit ngayon
Kay bilis maglaho ng kahapon
Sana'y 'wag kalimutan
Ang ating mga pinagsamahan
[Chorus]
At kung sakaling gipitin
Ay laging iisipin na
Minsan tayo ay naging
Tunay na magkaibigan
[Verse 3]
Minsan ay hindi mo na alam ang nangyayari
Kahit na anong gawin
Lahat ng bagay ay mayro'ng hangganan
Dahil ngayon, tayo ay nilimot ng kahapon
'Di na mapipilitang buhayin ang ating pinagsamahan
[Outro]
Ngunit kung sakaling mapadaan
Baka ikaw ay aking tawagan
Dahil minsan tayo ay naging
Tunay na magkaibigan

lyrics_full:
[Chorus]
Lift your head, baby, don't be scared
Of the things that could go wrong along the way
You'll get by with a smile
You can't win at everything but you can try
[Verse 1]
Baby, you don't have to worry
'Cause there ain't no need to hurry
No one ever said that there's an easy way
When they're closing all their doors
And they don't want you anymore
It sounds funny but I'll say it anyway
[Chorus]
Girl, I'll stay through the bad times
Even if I have to fetch you everyday
We'll get by with a smile
You can never be too happy in this life
[Verse 2]
'Cause in a world where everybody
Hates a happy ending story
It's a wonder love can make the world go round
But don't let it bring you down
And turn your face into a frown
Get along with a little prayer and a song
[Bridge]
(Too, doo-doo-doo)
Let me hear you sing it
(Too, doo-doo-doo)
[Verse 2]
'Cause in a world where everybody
Hates a happy ending story
It's a wonder love can make the world go round
But don't let it bring you down
And turn your face into a frown
Get along with a little prayer and a song
[Chorus]
Lift your head, baby, don't be scared
Of the things that could go wrong along the way
You'll get by with a smile
So now it's time to kiss away those tears, goodbye
[Outro]
(Too, doo-doo-doo)
Let me hear you sing it
(Too, doo-doo-doo)
With a smile

Chut-chu-ru-rut
Chut-chu-ru-rut

Meron ding nagnanakaw at nawawalan ng pera

I wish I could go back to those fairy book tales
Forget the real world awhile
And seek the seas of the talking whales
A place of wishing wells and magic spells
A place of wishing wells and magic spells
Where everything starts out once upon a time
Long, long ago and ends happily ever after

I could go up the hill and run with Jill
The giant could smell I'm no Englishman
Cinderella danced with me at the ball
I told the queen of hearts about my plan
I travelled wonderland with Alice
I met with Snow White in the woods
I flew with Peter Pan in never, never land
Picked some berries with miss Red Riding Hood

lyrics_full:
You can take me to the prom, promise not to tell your mom
Mama never tells you why, but she kicks you in the eye
I don't think she understands, I just wanna hold your hand
I don't even own a car, so we couldn't get that far
Father Marcus said to me, just confess and you'll be free
Sit you down upon my my lap, tell me your sins just like that
He said "Babe, you know the rules, you're livin' in a Catholic school"
All the teachers say you're fine, but they don't have dirty minds
I am only in my teens, I live only for my dreams
I cannot be made to stay
Life's a journey anyway
Life's a journey anyway, hey
[Guitar Solo]
Teacher, teacher please make me well
I don't want to go to hell
Teacher, teacher what can I do
"I don't know boy, it's up to you"
Its' time to free your mind
It's time to cleanse your soul
It's time to free your mind
It's time to cleanse your soul
Yo, Father, forgive me, for I have sinned
I'd rather talk to God but he's out and you're in
It's a little complicated, but Father, don't sweat it
You can hear me out and you can just forget it
Now, I haven't been to church in about ten years
One time, I had to pull my little sister's ear
But I'm not really violent, and it shows
I go for flower power as the stupid song goes
Sometimes I tell a lie, but only when it's true
And I often say things like "shit" and "fuck you"
I like to read a lot of dirty comic books
And I give my dirty teachers a lot of dirty looks
But this is the last thing that I'm ever gonna say
It's embarrassing for me to talk to you this way
But before I forget, before I carry on
I stole a table napkin from a fancy restaurant
Now, please, Father, tell me, tell me what I gotta do
I am full of guilt, and now it's up to you
Now, please, Father, tell me, tell me what I gotta do
I am full of guilt, and now it's up to you, hey!
Just say ten Hail Mary's
Twenty-one Glory Be's
Thirteen Our Father's
And a hundred Amen
Amen, amen, amen, amen
Amen, amen, amen, amen
Amen, amen, amen, wow!

lyrics_full:
[Verse 1: Eraserheads]
Wala akong bahay
Wala pang maari
Nasaan ang magulang?
Ano ang tunay kong pangalan?
[Bridge: Carmina Villaroel]
Ay, ay, ay, ay, ay-ayoko, ayoko, ayoko, itay!
[Verse 2: Eraserheads]
Hari ng kalye
Walang relihiyon
'Wag panghimasukan
'Wag na 'wag pakikialaman
[Bridge]
Sa kanya, makakatikim kami ng ginhawa
Pagkain, malaking bahay
Kotse, alahas
[Chorus: Eraserheads]
Kailangan bang magnakaw ('Di ba, Bert, ano palang nangyari kay Richard?)
Para magkalaman ang tiyan? (Nasagasaan ng pison)
Pa-hassle pa sa pulis (Ay, mukhang birhen ang misis mo)
Para may matirahan (Pa'no ko magagawa sa sales lady 'yon?)
Wating na buhay 'to hanggang kailan (O sa kolehiyala?)
Wating na buhay 'to hanggang kailan (Sobra naman ang mga media)
[Verse 1: Eraserheads]
Wala akong bahay
Wala pang makain
Nasaan ang magulang?
Ano ang tunay kong pangalan?
[Bridge]
Kailan ba tayo titira ng high-tech?
Ano, tulad ng [?]
[Verse 2: Eraserheads]
Hari ng Kalye, walang dinidiyos
'Wag panghimasukan
'Wag na 'wag pakikialaman
[Bridge]
Wala na tayong lulusutan, kumalas na tayo
Lalaban tayo, wating tayo, 'di ba?
Wala akong kaibigan
[Chorus: Eraserheads]
Kailangan bang magnakaw (Hindi kita kaibigan)
Para magkalaman ang tiyan? (Lahat tayo naggagamitan lang)
Pa-hassle pa sa pulis (Trip lang 'to)
Para may matirahan (Everything is under control, I don't)
Wating na buhay 'to hanggang kailan (Trust me, aayusin ko silang lahat)
Wating na buhay 'to hanggang kailan (Buhay 'to, gusto ko nang magpakamatay)
[Instrumental Break]
[Outro: Carmina]
Sa gitna ng gulo, pakinggan ang puso
Isang saglit lang, sinta
Magpadaloy sa agos ng damdamin
Limutin mo na ang dilim ng mundo
Hawakan ang akong kamay
Sa malayo tayo ay maglalakbay

lyrics_full:
[Verse 1]
Minsan sa may Kalayaan tayo'y nagkatagpuan
May mga sariling gimik
At kaniya-kaniyang hangad sa buhay
Sa ilalim ng iisang bubong
Mga sikretong ibinubulong
Kahit na anong mangyari
Kahit na saan ka man patungo
[Pre-Chorus]
Ngunit ngayon
Kay bilis maglaho ng kahapon
Sana'y 'wag kalimutan
Ang ating mga pinagsamahan
[Chorus]
At kung sakaling gipitin
Ay laging iisipin na
Minsan tayo ay naging
Tunay na magkaibigan
[Instrumental Break]
[Verse 2]
Minsan ay parang wala nang bukas sa buhay natin
Inuman hanggang sa magdamag
Na para bang tayo'y mauubusan
Sa ilalim ng bilog na buwan
Mga tiyan nati'y walang laman
Ngunit kahit na walang pera
Ang bawat gabi'y anong saya
[Pre-Chorus]
Ngunit ngayon
Kay bilis maglaho ng kahapon
Sana'y 'wag kalimutan
Ang ating mga pinagsamahan
[Chorus]
At kung sakaling gipitin
Ay laging iisipin na
Minsan tayo ay naging
Tunay na magkaibigan
[Verse 3]
Minsan ay hindi mo na alam ang nangyayari
Kahit na anong gawin
Lahat ng bagay ay mayro'ng hangganan
Dahil ngayon, tayo ay nilimot ng kahapon
'Di na mapipilitang buhayin ang ating pinagsamahan
[Outro]
Ngunit kung sakaling mapadaan
Baka ikaw ay aking tawagan
Dahil minsan tayo ay naging
Tunay na magkaibigan

lyrics_full:
[Chorus]
Lift your head, baby, don't be scared
Of the things that could go wrong along the way
You'll get by with a smile
You can't win at everything but you can try
[Verse 1]
Baby, you don't have to worry
'Cause there ain't no need to hurry
No one ever said that there's an easy way
When they're closing all their doors
And they don't want you anymore
It sounds funny but I'll say it anyway
[Chorus]
Girl, I'll stay through the bad times
Even if I have to fetch you everyday
We'll get by with a smile
You can never be too happy in this life
[Verse 2]
'Cause in a world where everybody
Hates a happy ending story
It's a wonder love can make the world go round
But don't let it bring you down
And turn your face into a frown
Get along with a little prayer and a song
[Bridge]
(Too, doo-doo-doo)
Let me hear you sing it
(Too, doo-doo-doo)

But don't let it bring you down
And turn your face into a frown
Get along with a little prayer and a song
[Chorus]
Lift your head, baby, don't be scared
Of the things that could go wrong along the way
You'll get by with a smile
So now it's time to kiss away those tears, goodbye
[Outro]
(Too, doo-doo-doo)
Let me hear you sing it
(Too, doo-doo-doo)
With a smile

lyrics_full:
[Intro]
I wish I could go back to those fairy book tales
Forget the real world awhile
And seek the seas of the talking whales
A place of wishing wells and magic spells
A place of wishing wells and magic spells
Where everything starts out once upon a time
Long, long ago and ends happily ever after
[Verse 1]
I could go up the hill and run with Jill
The giant could smell I'm no Englishman
Cinderella danced with me at the ball
I told the queen of hearts about my plan
I travelled wonderland with Alice
I met with Snow White in the woods
I flew with Peter Pan in never, never land
Picked some berries with miss Red Riding Hood
[Chorus]
I wish I could go back to those fairy book tales
Forget the real world awhile
And seek the seas of the talking whales
A place of wishing wells and magic spells
A place of wishing wells and magic spells
Where everything starts out once upon a time
Long, long ago and ends happily ever after
[Verse 2]
I could be an outlaw in the west
Save the damsels in distress
We could sleep a hundred years
I could wake you up with a kiss
We'll swim the seven seas
We could make love more than twice
Fly like dragons in the skies
[Verse 3]
We could hang around the trees up
Buzz around like bees
We could make some honey
We don't need no money, baby
Just turn your back
You'll see jumpin' jelly beans sack
Just wait for me Jack
I'll be back, I'll be back
[Chorus]

Kailan mo ako hahagkan
Matagal na akong naghihintay
Nakadungaw sa bintana
Mga dahon lang ang kumakaway

Kailan ko mararamdaman
Pagdampi ng iyong labi
Tinatanaw ko ang mga bituin
Mga luha humahalik sa aking pisngi

Higpit ng yakap ng 'yong dibdib
Nakatingin ako sa salamin
May guhit ang noo't mapait ang ngiti

lyrics_full:
[Spoken]
Oy, I'm Punk Zappa
And my hobbies are listening to radio
Reading the song hits and eating b-bloody fish balls
A-ha, bibili ako ng tapes ng Nirvana
Pearl Jam, Sepultura, Alice in Chains, Soundgarden
Rage Against the Machine, Pantera
'Tsaka 'yung Red Hot Chili Peppers band
'Tsaka lahat ng klase ng grunge, lahat ng death metal, okay?
Tapos me-memorize ko 'yung lyrics kahit chorus lang, okay?
Tapos magpapakalbo, magpapa-mohawk, magpa-long hair kaya 'ko?
Tapos magpapa-tattoo ako, dapat 'yung nakakatakot
Ah, dragon, pare, tapos 'yung dragon, nakatusok sa stick
Tapos 'yung stick, nakatusok sa ulo ni Charles Manson, Jr
Cool 'yon, 'di ba?
Tapos dapat mayro'n akong boots
O kaya naman Converse para sa slam dancing
Tapos, oy, bibili akong Nirvana t-shirt
Hindi 'yung yellow, ha, 'yung red
Tapos magpapahikaw ako
Tapos, 'di puwede na akong makitribo sa mga kamukha ko
Oy, tapos puwede na kaming tumambay sa Club Dredd
Sa labas lang, ha?
Tapos 'pag Linggo, pupunta kaming lahat sa, sa Megamall
Tapos aabangan naming mga hip-hop na 'yan
Tapos pag-uumpugin ko 'yang mga kiningining breakdancer at mga "yo" na 'yan, eh
Tapos bubugbugin namin sila
Tapos kukunin namin 'yung mga TFs nila, okay ba 'yon?
Oy, Amen, gusto niyo? (Amen), t'yak 'yon (Amen)

lyrics_full:
[Intro]
Oooh, oooh, oooh
Oooh, oooh, oooh, oooh
[Verse 1]
Nakita kita sa isang magasin
Dilaw ang 'yong suot at buhok mo'y green
'Sang tindahan sa may Baclaran
Napatingin, natulala sa'yong kagandahan
[Verse 2]
Naaalala mo pa ba no'ng tayo pang dal'wa?
'Di ko inakalang sisikat ka
Tinawanan pa kita, tinawag mo 'kong walang hiya
Medyo pangit ka pa no'n, ngunit ngayon
[Chorus]
Hey!
, 
iba na ang 'yong ngiti, iba na ang 'yong tingin
Nagbago na'ng lahat sa'yo
, 
oh, oh
Sana'y hindi nakita, sana'y walang problema
'Pagkat kulang ang dala kong perang
[Post-Chorus]
Pambili, ooh
Pambili sa mukha mong maganda
[Verse 3]
Siguro ay may kotse ka na ngayon
Rumarampa sa entablado, damit mo'y gawa ni Sotto
Siguro ay malapit ka na ring sumali
Sa Supermodel of the Whole Wide Universe
[Chorus]
Kasi iba na ang 'yong ngiti, iba na ang 'yong tingin
Nagbago na'ng lahat sa'yo, oh, oh
Sana'y hindi nakita, sana'y walang problema
'Pagkat kulang ang dala kong pera
[Guitar Solo]
[Verse 4]
Nakita kita sa isang magasin
At sa sobrang gulat, 'di ko napansin
Bastos pala ang pamagat, dali-dali ang binuklat
At ako'y namulat sa hubad na katotohanan

Hey, iba na ang 'yong ngiti, iba na ang 'yong tingin
Nagbago na'ng lahat sa'yo, oh, oh
Sana'y hindi nakita, sana'y walang problema

Pambili, ooh
Pambili sa mukha mong maganda

Sana sa susunod na issue
Ay centerfold ka na, ah, ah
Oooh, oooh, oooh
Oooh, oooh, oooh, oooh
Oooh, oooh, oooh, oooh, oooh

lyrics_full:
You can take me to the prom, promise not to tell your mom
Mama never tells you why, but she kicks you in the eye
I don't think she understands, I just wanna hold your hand
I don't even own a car, so we couldn't get that far
Father Marcus said to me, just confess and you'll be free
Sit you down upon my my lap, tell me your sins just like that
He said "Babe, you know the rules, you're livin' in a Catholic school"
All the teachers say you're fine, but they don't have dirty minds
I am only in my teens, I live only for my dreams
I cannot be made to stay
Life's a journey anyway
Life's a journey anyway, hey
[Guitar Solo]
Teacher, teacher please make me well
I don't want to go to hell
Teacher, teacher what can I do
"I don't know boy, it's up to you"
Its' time to free your mind
It's time to cleanse your soul
It's time to free your mind
It's time to cleanse your soul
Yo, Father, forgive me, for I have sinned
I'd rather talk to God but he's out and you're in
It's a little complicated, but Father, don't sweat it
You can hear me out and you can just forget it
Now, I haven't been to church in about ten years
One time, I had to pull my little sister's ear
But I'm not really violent, and it shows
I go for flower power as the stupid song goes
Sometimes I tell a lie, but only when it's true
And I often say things like "shit" and "fuck you"
I like to read a lot of dirty comic books
And I give my dirty teachers a lot of dirty looks
But this is the last thing that I'm ever gonna say
It's embarrassing for me to talk to you this way
But before I forget, before I carry on
I stole a table napkin from a fancy restaurant
Now, please, Father, tell me, tell me what I gotta do
I am full of guilt, and now it's up to you
Now, please, Father, tell me, tell me what I gotta do
I am full of guilt, and now it's up to you, hey!
Just say ten Hail Mary's
Twenty-one Glory Be's
Thirteen Our Father's
And a hundred Amen
Amen, amen, amen, amen
Amen, amen, amen, amen
Amen, amen, amen, wow!

Mama never tells you why, but she kicks you in the eye
I don't think she understands, I just wanna hold your hand
I don't even own a car, so we couldn't get that far
I am only in my teens, I live only for my dreams
I cannot be made to stay
Life's a journey anyway

Sa wakas ay nakita ko na ang aking hinahanap
Sa wakas ay nakuha ko na ang aking hinahangad
Kay tagal ko nang naghintay at nagsunog ng kilay
Ngayon ay masasabi ko na matamis ang tagumpay
Sa wakas ay nabihag ko na ang aking minamahal
Sa wakas ay natapos ko na ang aking sinimulan

Wala namang nilaga

O bakit ba ako pinahirapan ng husto
Kay dami-daming kumokontra
Sa bawat kilos ko
Nasan na ba kayo
Tignan ninyo ako
Hindi niyo inakala na ako'y mananalo
Pero salamat na rin sa inyo

lyrics_full:
[Verse 1]
May mga kumakalat na balita
Na ang misis ni kuwan ay madaling makakuha
Bago maniwala, mag-isip-isip ka muna
Marami ang namamatay sa maling akala
[Verse 2]
Nung ako'y musmos pa lamang ay takot sa multo
Nung ako'y naging binata, sa erpat ng siyota ko
Ngayong may asawa at mayroon nang pamilya
Wala namang multo ngunit takot sa asawa ko
[Pre-Chorus]
'Di mo na kailangang mag-alinlangan
Kung tama ang gagawin mo
Basta't huwag kalimutang magdahan-dahan
Kung 'di sigurado sa kalalabasan
Kalalabasan ng binabalak mo
[Chorus]
Maliit na butas, lumalaki
Konting gusot, dumadami
'Di mo maibabaon sa limot at bahala
Kapag nabulag ka, ha
Ng maling akala
[Verse 3]
Nasa'n na ba ako? Kaninong kama 'to?
Ilang ulit na bang nagigising sa ibang kuwarto?
Naglayas sa bahay, akala madali ang buhay
Ngayon ay nagsisisi dahil 'di nakapagtapos
[Pre-Chorus]
'Di mo na kailangang mag-alinlangan
Kung tama ang gagawin mo
Basta't huwag kalimutang magdahan-dahan
Kung 'di sigurado sa kalalabasan
Kalalabasan ng binabalak mo, oh-oh
[Chorus]
Maliit na butas, lumalaki
Konting gusot, dumadami
'Di mo maibabaon sa limot at bahala
Kapag nabulag ka, ha
Ng maling akala
[Bridge]
May mga kumakalat na balita
Na ang kaligtasa'y madaling makuha
Bago maniwala, mag-isip-isip ka muna
Marami ang namamatay
[Outro]
Sa maling akala (Maliit na butas, lumalaki)
Sa maling akala, yeah (Konting gusot, dumadami)
Sa maling akala, oh (Maliit na butas, lumalaki)
Sa maling akala (Konting gusot, dumadami)
Sa maling akala, uh, uh, uh (Maliit na butas, lumalaki)

lyrics_full:
[Verse 1]
Ilang awit pa ba ang aawitin, oh giliw ko?
Ilang ulit pa ba ang uulitin, oh giliw ko?
Tatlong oras na akong nagpapacute sa'yo
'Di mo man lang napapansin ang bagong t-shirt ko
[Verse 2]
Ilang isaw pa ba ang kakainin, oh giliw ko?
Ilang tanzan pa ba ang iipunin, oh giliw ko?
Gagawin ko ang lahat, pati ang thesis mo
'Wag mo lang ipagkait ang hinahanap ko
[Pre-Chorus]
Sagutin mo lang ako
Aking sinta'y walang humpay na ligaya
[Chorus]
At asahang, iibigin ka
Sa tanghali, sa gabi at umaga
'Wag ka sanang magtanong at magduda
Dahil ang puso ko'y walang pangamba na
Tayo'y mabubuhay na tahimik at buong ligaya
[Verse 3]
Ilang ahit pa ba ang aahitin, oh giliw ko?
Ilang hirit pa ba ang hihiritin, oh giliw ko?
'Di naman ako manyakis tulad nang iba

lyrics_full:
(Hey!) We took a trip by boat
Into the promised land
To sing a different note
Man I don't understand
We wanted their attention
Our balls went up so high
They wanted too much Poison
And Warrant's Cherry Pie
It's a crying, crying, crying shame
We didn't have no dough
We didn't have no clue
We lived a life of kings
Dined on some royal stew
We felt like shitty rockstars
Our pictures on the wall
We're Robby's pekaloids
Running silly down the hall
Chorus:
I wanna go home now
Back to my old hometown
Where I can sing the blues
Let's stop this running around
I miss the people dancing
I'm (just) saying this
But, baby you can bet your puwet
I'll do it again some time for the money
Combo on the run, yeh!
It's a crying, crying, crying shame
It's a downright shame! (Well)
(Repeat 1st stanza)
(Repeat Chorus)
I'm saying this but, baby you can bet your puwet
I'll do it again sometime for the money
(Yeh...) Combo on the run...
(Repeat last line)

lyrics_full:
[Verse 1]
There's a fruitcake for everybody
There's a fruitcake for everyone
There are B-sides to every story
If you decide to have some fun
[Chorus]
Take a bite
It's alright
There's some brandy and star margarine to make it bright
Take a bite
It's alright
A little lovin' and some fruit to bake
Life is a piece of cake
[Verse 2]
It's the season for being happy
But the reason is dead and gone
If the reason for being happy
Takes a backseat when the season's done
[Chorus]
Just take a bite
It's alright
Taste the taste that sent all mothers giggling in sheer delight
Take a bite
It's alright
A little lovin and some fruit to bake
Life is a piece of cake
[Post-Chorus]
Everybody, everywhere, people do you really care?
Christmas time has once again arrived
Everybody, everywhere, people do you really care?
Christmas time has once again arrived
Mistletoe and a little snow
But we don't get it there at fruitcake heights
Mistletoe and a little snow
But we don't get it there at fruitcake heights
[Bridge]
Stars are falling down from heaven
But it's nowhere near our town
Miracles are falling down from heaven
But it's nowhere near our town
[Verse 3]
There's a fruitcake in everybody
There's a fruitcake in everyone
There are B-sides to every story
And that story has just begun
[Chorus]
Just take a bite
It's alright
Taste the taste that sent all mothers giggling in sheer delight
Take a bite

lyrics_full:
We are the carol kings
And we'd like to say hello
We're here to sing you every
Little Christmas song we know
So get ready close or open your windows
Take out or hide your money
Honey we don't care
We're here to sing the staples
Old fashioned Christmas carols
Oh, here we go again
Merry Christmas everybody
Happy new year too
Merry Christmas everybody
Happy new year too
We'll sing of chestnuts frosting
On the turtle doves comin' to town
We'll sing of building a snowman
And pretending he's Jackson Browne
Silverbells, silverbells
Silver all the way
What fun it is to give love
On a one horse Christmas day
It doesn't really matter
The former or the latter
Coz all we really wanna say is
Merry Christmas everybody
Happy new year too
Merry Christmas everybody
Happy new year too
Merry merry Christmas everybody
Happy new year too

Happy new year too

Let earth in heavenly peace

We hope that you had a Christmas ball
We really have to go

Now people let me hear you sing

lyrics_full:
1-2-3-and…
Da da ra ra da da ra da da da da da da da!
Da da ra ra da da ra da da da da da da da!
C is for the candy trimmed around the christmas tree
H is for the happiness in all the family
R is for the reindeer prancing by the window pane
I is for the icing on the cake as sweet as sugar cane
S is for the stocking on the chimney wall
T is for the toys beneath the tree so tall
M is for the mistletoe where everyone is kissed
A is for the angels who make up the christmas list
S is for the santa who makes every kid his friend
Be good and he’ll bring you everything in a christmas alphabet!
Da da ra ra da da ra da da da da da da da!
C is for the conio kids around the christmas tree
H is for the homeless kids around the christmas tree
R is for the red tide, madami sa canteen
I is for illegal, all year round that you can daily see
S is for the snow, wala noon dito
T is for the traffic, marami tayo nun
M is for the mayors whom everyone is pissed
A is for the ampons who make up the concert list
S is for the sweldo pambili ng regalo
Da da ra ra da da ra da da da da da da da!
Da da ra ra da da ra da da da da da da da!
Hey!
C is for the fushcia car we all are asking of
H is for Eraserheads, oh please don’t ask us why
R is for the Aries, that’s good enough for me
I is for Eraserheads again, as sweet as sugar cane
S is for the santo on the chimney wall
T is for the tansan, may we have them all
M is for the money, money, money, money, money
A is buy our album so we can buy a car
S is for the sorry coz we don’t know how to rhyme
Be good and we promise not to sing that Christmas Alphabet (Again!)
Be good and we promise not to sing that Christmas Alphabet (Again!)
Be good and we promise not to sing that Christmas Alphabet (Again!)
Be good and we promise not to sing that Christmas Alphabet

lyrics_full:
[Verse 1]
Ilang awit pa ba ang aawitin, oh giliw ko?
Ilang ulit pa ba ang uulitin, oh giliw ko?
Tatlong oras na akong nagpapacute sa'yo
'Di mo man lang napapansin ang bagong t-shirt ko
[Verse 2]
Ilang isaw pa ba ang kakainin, oh giliw ko?
Ilang tanzan pa ba ang iipunin, oh giliw ko?
Gagawin ko ang lahat, pati ang thesis mo
'Wag mo lang ipagkait ang hinahanap ko
[Pre-Chorus]
Sagutin mo lang ako
Aking sinta'y walang humpay na ligaya
[Chorus]
At asahang, iibigin ka
Sa tanghali, sa gabi at umaga
'Wag ka sanang magtanong at magduda
Dahil ang puso ko'y walang pangamba na
Tayo'y mabubuhay na tahimik at buong ligaya

lyrics_full:
[Verse 1]
Pare ko, meron akong problema
'Wag mong sabihing "na naman?"
In love ako sa isang kolehiyala
Hindi ko maintindihan
'Wag na nating idaan sa ma-boteng usapan
Lalo lang madaragdagan
Ang sakit ng ulo at bilbil sa tiyan
[Verse 2]
Anong sarap kami'y naging magkaibigan
Napuno ako ng pag-asa
'Yun pala, haggang do'n lang ang kaya
Akala ko ay pwede pa
[Pre-Chorus]
Masakit mang isipin kailangang tanggapin?
Kung kailan ka naging seryoso
Saka ka niya gagaguhin!
[Chorus]
Oh, jusko, ano ba naman ito?
'Di ba? Tangina!
Nagmukha akong tanga
Pinaasa niya lang ako
Letseng pag-ibig 'to!
Jusko, ano ba naman ito?
[Verse 3]
Sabi niya ayaw niya munang magkasiyota
De-hins ako naniwala
'Di nagtagal, naging gano'n na rin ang tema
Kulang na lang ay sagot niya
[Pre-Chorus]
Ba't ba ang labo niya?
'Di ko mapinta
Hanggang kailan maghihintay?
Ako ay nabuburat na!
[Bridge]
Pero, minamahal ko siya
'Di biro, T.L. ako sa kaniya
Alam kong nababaduyan ka na sa mga sinasabi ko
Pero sana naman ay maintindihan mo
[Verse 4]
Oh, pare ko, meron ka bang maipapayo?
Kung wala ay okay lang
Kailangan lang ay ang iyong pakikiramay
Andito ka ay ayos na
[Pre-Chorus]
Masakit mang isipin kailangang tanggapin?
Kung kailan ka naging seryoso
Saka ka niya gagaguhin!

'Di ba? Tangina!
Nagmukha akong tanga
Pinaasa niya lang ako
Letseng pag-ibig 'to!
Jusko, ano ba naman ito?
[Outro]
'Di ba? Tangina!
Nagmukha akong tanga
Pinaasa niya lang ako
Letseng pag-ibig 'to!
Jusko, ano ba naman ito?

lyrics_full:
[Intro]
This next song is all about love
And I wrote it all by myself
They try to tell us we're too young
Too young to really be in love
[Verse 1]
Bahay nami'y maliit lamang
Pero, pero, pero, pero malinis 'to pati sa kusina
Kumain man kami laging sama-sama
Pen-pen-pen de sarapen
De kutsilyo de almasen
Haw-haw-haw de karabaw
De karabaw de batuten
Pengeng singko pambili ng puto
Sa mga tindera ng bicho-bicho
Skyflakes, Coke 500 pahingi ng kiss
Pambayad mo sa jeepney kulang pa ng diyes
[Chorus]
Mahal ko si Toyang
'Pagkat siya'y simple lamang
Kahit namomroblema
Basta't kami ay magkasama
[Verse 2]
Madalas man kaming walang pera
Makita lang ang kislap ng kaniyang mga mata
Ako ay busog na
At nakatambay kami sa Tandang Sora
[Bridge]
Ti ayat ti masya nga baro
(How can I tell you about my loved one?)
Ken balasang nataina
(How can I tell you about my loved one?)
Uray man uray man uray man
(How can I tell you about my loved one?)
Haan unay nga nadonya
(How can I tell you about my loved one?)
[Verse 3]
Bahay nami'y maliit lamang
Pero, pero, pero, pero malinis 'to pati sa kusina
Kumain man kami laging sama-sama
Pen-pen-pen de sarapen
De kutsilyo de almasen
Haw-haw-haw de karabaw
De karabaw de batuten
[Chorus]
Mahal ko si Toyang
'Pagkat siya'y simple lamang
Kahit namomroblema
Basta't kami ay magkasama
[Outro]
Toyang, oh Toyang
Please, pakinggan mo 'ko
I will always be true to you
 (Wooh!)
We were not too young at all!
 (Woh!)

lyrics_full:
[Verse 1]
Minsan sa may Kalayaan tayo'y nagkatagpuan
May mga sariling gimik
At kaniya-kaniyang hangad sa buhay
Sa ilalim ng iisang bubong
Mga sikretong ibinubulong
Kahit na anong mangyari
Kahit na saan ka man patungo
[Pre-Chorus]
Ngunit ngayon
Kay bilis maglaho ng kahapon
Sana'y 'wag kalimutan
Ang ating mga pinagsamahan
[Chorus]
At kung sakaling gipitin
Ay laging iisipin na
Minsan tayo ay naging
Tunay na magkaibigan
[Instrumental Break]
[Verse 2]
Minsan ay parang wala nang bukas sa buhay natin
Inuman hanggang sa magdamag
Na para bang tayo'y mauubusan
Sa ilalim ng bilog na buwan
Mga tiyan nati'y walang laman
Ngunit kahit na walang pera
Ang bawat gabi'y anong saya
[Pre-Chorus]
Ngunit ngayon
Kay bilis maglaho ng kahapon
Sana'y 'wag kalimutan
Ang ating mga pinagsamahan
[Chorus]
At kung sakaling gipitin
Ay laging iisipin na
Minsan tayo ay naging
Tunay na magkaibigan
[Verse 3]
Minsan ay hindi mo na alam ang nangyayari
Kahit na anong gawin
Lahat ng bagay ay mayro'ng hangganan
Dahil ngayon, tayo ay nilimot ng kahapon
'Di na mapipilitang buhayin ang ating pinagsamahan
[Outro]
Ngunit kung sakaling mapadaan
Baka ikaw ay aking tawagan
Dahil minsan tayo ay naging
Tunay na magkaibigan

lyrics_full:
[Verse 1]
Kamukha mo si Paraluman
Nung tayo ay bata pa
At ang galing-galing mong sumayaw
Mapa-boogie man o cha-cha
Ngunit ang paborito
Ay pagsayaw mo nang El Bimbo
Nakakaindak, nakakaaliw
Nakakatindig balahibo
[Pre-Chorus]

Na umibig ng tunay

lyrics_full:
[Chorus]
Lift your head, baby, don't be scared
Of the things that could go wrong along the way
You'll get by with a smile
You can't win at everything but you can try
[Verse 1]
Baby, you don't have to worry
'Cause there ain't no need to hurry
No one ever said that there's an easy way
When they're closing all their doors
And they don't want you anymore
It sounds funny but I'll say it anyway
[Chorus]
Girl, I'll stay through the bad times
Even if I have to fetch you everyday
We'll get by with a smile
You can never be too happy in this life
[Verse 2]
'Cause in a world where everybody
Hates a happy ending story
It's a wonder love can make the world go round
But don't let it bring you down
And turn your face into a frown
Get along with a little prayer and a song
[Bridge]
(Too, doo-doo-doo)
Let me hear you sing it
(Too, doo-doo-doo)
[Verse 2]
'Cause in a world where everybody
Hates a happy ending story
It's a wonder love can make the world go round
But don't let it bring you down
And turn your face into a frown
Get along with a little prayer and a song
[Chorus]
Lift your head, baby, don't be scared
Of the things that could go wrong along the way
You'll get by with a smile
So now it's time to kiss away those tears, goodbye
[Outro]
(Too, doo-doo-doo)
Let me hear you sing it
(Too, doo-doo-doo)
With a smile

Zipadee-dooda Zipadee-day
 Hiphop Hooray!
Menage one, Menage Trois, Menage Three

Chimney-chimney Humpty Dumpty

Funky with the flavor that you savor, imitator
I'm the flavor of the hour other mc's I devour
I'll be with Buddy, Raimund, Marcus, and Ely
I'm on their case like Petrocelli
Electromagnetic Hiphop and it don't
Stop and it don't quit word-Up!
Lap it up like a pussy, sippin' on milk
Rock hard to my style that's smooth as silk
Yo, Superproxy why don't you just talk to me?
